attributes.action: abolish Crown and other forms of governmental copyright on all publicly funded documents
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Despite the fact that all public documents are funded by the taxpayer, the taxpayer does not have the right to use them as they see fit; they have to get permission off the government - in the form of a licence - to be able to use them.  Effectively we are being charged twice: once for creating them, once more for using them.
